summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of certain portions of Block 13, C. D. Hillman's Meadow Gardens Addition Division No. 2 and of Blocks 40 A and 44 in C. D. Hillman's Meadow Gardens Addition Division No. 4; Lot 15, Block 12, Capitol Hill Division No. 3; Lot 5 and south 10 feet of Lot 6, Block 1, White's Addition; Lot 6 Block 1, Byron Additions; Lot 1 except the north 42 feet, Lots 2 and 3, Acre 1, Tract 14, Maple Leaf Addition to Green Lake Circle; and Lots 6 and 7, Block 63, A. A. Denny's 5th Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-275 and 17-222, respectively.
